About Me

I’m a software engineer from Manchester currently living in London. I work full time at Lloyds Bank in the frontend development team and am slightly addicted to side projects.


My hobbies include travelling and technology. Random fact, I survived cancer. Ask me anything on Twitter if you're curious.
